channel.title: CVE Feed for Rocket.Chat -- Rocket.Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rocket.Chat -- Rocket.Chat

item.title: CVE-2024-39713|2024-09-06T16:32:07.303Z -- rocket.chat -- rocket.chat
item.description: A Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) affects Rocket.Chat's Twilio webhook endpoint before version 6.10.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-37405|2024-08-02T03:50:56.177Z -- rocket.chat -- rocket.chat
item.description: Livechat messages can be leaked by combining two NoSQL injections affecting livechat:loginByToken (pre-authentication) and livechat:loadHistory.

item.description: Livechat messages can be leaked by combining two NoSQL injections affecting livechat:loginByToken (pre-authentication) and livechat:loadHistory.
